attributes.action: Children with Irlen syndrome, dyslexia and scotopic sensitivity to recieve glasses with coloured lenses free on the nhs
attributes.additional_details: We would like the government to make these glasses available for children free on the nhs. Currently they are only available privately and cost £300 for the test plus over £100 for the glasses and lenses. The lenses help children to read, look at the computer, whiteboard in the classroom etc without text distortion
